title: Diamond & Emerald Vaddanam - A Regal Waist Belt of Timeless Beauty
materials: Adorned with 24.23 carats of brilliant-cut diamonds (4077 stones) with exceptional fire and clarity
24.90 carats of captivating emeralds (7 stones) with vibrant green hues
and 42.33 carats of Freshwater Pearls (20 pieces). Features a high-quality Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: This exquisite Vaddanam features a traditional South Indian design with intricate filigree work and floral motifs. The central emerald is surrounded by a halo of diamonds. Elegant rows of diamond-studded floral patterns connect to the belt and suspend lustrous freshwater pearls. Traditional 'kundan' setting ensures the gemstones are securely and beautifully showcased. The design incorporates elements of 'nakshi' work to enhance the antique feel, blending tradition with contemporary appeal.
colors: Predominantly gold with a sparkling white from the diamonds. A striking contrast is provided by the deep green of the emeralds
hints of red from the rubies
and the soft white of the pearls.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Makes a statement piece for formal galas and high-profile events
description: This Vaddanam is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, seamlessly blending traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern diamond-setting techniques. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensure lasting brilliance and value. It's not just jewelry; it's an heirloom piece representing cultural heritage and timeless elegance. Its durable construction ensures it can be cherished for generations.
